body:
The current libtiff site is http://www.remotesensing.org/libtiff/; 
libtiff.org is now years out of date.  Modest support continues; there 
is a mailing list managed by Frank Warmerdam, on behalf the Open Source 
Geospatial Foundation, OSGeo.


The current version of libtiff is 4.0.3, released in September of 2012, 
available at http://www.remotesensing.org/libtiff/.  The GnuWin32 
version is derived from libtiff 3.8.2, which was released in March 
2007.  So far as I know it has not been tested with Radiance.


Hunh.


Randolph M. Fritz
___
